name: Mitigation Playbook for PowerShell Script Execution Incident
description: This playbook addresses an incident where an attacker used PowerShell to execute a malicious script, potentially gaining unauthorized access and attempting privilege escalation.

action--a54f659d-0d42-4ee4-b26e-9c511d09.name: Terminate malicious PowerShell process
action--a54f659d-0d42-4ee4-b26e-9c511d09.description: Terminate any running PowerShell processes that may be executing the malicious script.

parallel--c2de75d4-1a02-4c13-9ee7-473f54.name: Execute mitigation actions
parallel--c2de75d4-1a02-4c13-9ee7-473f54.description: Simultaneously run actions for patching, cleanup, and monitoring.

action--b63bfc72-c5d1-497a-9b06-ffac9289.name: Apply security patch for kernel vulnerability
action--b63bfc72-c5d1-497a-9b06-ffac9289.description: Update the system and apply patches for known vulnerabilities.

commands.command: if [ ! $(uname -r) = 'patched-kernel-version' ]; then sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install patch-package; fi

action--c87e59f3-d772-45a2-bd89-5417395d.name: Remove downloaded malicious script
action--c87e59f3-d772-45a2-bd89-5417395d.description: Delete any downloaded malicious script to prevent further execution.

loop--d10683b8-5dbc-4f0f-9c5e-55ab0ae3fd.name: Scan system for further infections
loop--d10683b8-5dbc-4f0f-9c5e-55ab0ae3fd.description: Continuously scan the system for infections until the system is clean.

action--d10683b8-5dbc-4f0f-9c5e-55ab0ae3.name: Perform system scan
action--d10683b8-5dbc-4f0f-9c5e-55ab0ae3.description: Scan the system for further infections.

action--e57a6f0c-5e29-4529-af6a-b14174b9.name: Monitor network traffic for abnormal activities
action--e57a6f0c-5e29-4529-af6a-b14174b9.description: Set up monitoring for any suspicious network activity.
